description: UX checklist for flows, IA, and accessibility.
---

# UX Planning Skill

## When to use
- The user requests user flows, IA, or UX guidance.

## Steps
1. Define personas and primary goals.
2. Map key flows and edge cases.
3. Outline navigation and IA.
4. Add UX writing and content notes.
5. Include accessibility checks.
